name: Soylent Green Thanatorium (WebGL)
description:
WebGL version of the experience sans video and audio.  You can download the PC/Mac version here which has working video and audio. 

The world of Soylent Green (1977) is set in the year 2022.  So why not revisit one of the most poignant moments in this dystopian sci-fi classic.  This is a simple recreation of the assisted suicide center that actor Edward G. Robinson's character Sol decides to go to end his life.  Walk around a 3D version of the Thanatorium from Soylent Green accompanied by the the audio featured in Sol's death scene from the film.
